thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: China to push rental housing asset-backed securitization - regulator

title: China to push rental housing asset-backed securitization - regulator
text:
BEIJING, April 25 (Reuters) - China will encourage companies to conduct rental housing asset-backed securitization, while strengthening supervision and management on such securities, the countryâ€™s securities regulator said on Wednesday in a joint statement with the housing ministry.
Securitization in mid-tier and large cities, as well as the new Xiongan area, will be a priority, the China Securities Regulatory Commission said in the statement posted on its website. (Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Writing by Yawen Chen; Editing by Kim Coghill)
